name: Exsanguination
description:
It's a normal day... until it isn't!

Exsanguination follows the story of a simple young man on a normal day that gets turned upside down by a gunshot. He only has  a few seconds to do something before he meets his demise!

Exsanguination is a side-scroller game that's made for the 20 Second Game Jam. This game contains somewhat a form of violence but it's not to the point where children can't play so I don't think a warning is needed.

CREDITS
  • Programming / Art / Audio: Me (ZumTheZazaKing)
  • Dream Speedrun Music Remix by Levi Niha
FEATURES
  • Simple Story - A guy gets, bleeds, needs help, is there really more to say?
  • Replayability - This game has 5 different endings (at the moment) and each playthrough must be played differently to get certain endings.
  • OK Art - I just gathered shapes together and put them together like building blocks (I'm not an artist)
  • Ohio - Ohio
CONTROLS
  •  A and D to Move
  • P to pause
  • E / Z / Slash (/) to attack
